description: This file defines the FriendService class, which provides friend request handling functionalities such as sending, accepting, rejecting friend requests, and retrieving friend lists within the application.

classes.name: FriendService
classes.description: Implements friend request management, including sending, accepting, rejecting requests, and listing friends.

methods.name: SendRequestAsync
methods.description: Creates and sends a new friend request from one user to another after performing validity checks.

methods.name: AcceptAsync
methods.description: Accepts a pending friend request, updating its status and timestamp.

methods.name: RejectAsync
methods.description: Rejects a pending friend request, updating its status and timestamp.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Lists the friend requests for a user, optionally filtered to pending ones only.

methods.name: GetFriendsAsync
methods.description: Retrieves the list of friends for a user.

methods.name: AreFriendsAsync
methods.description: Checks if two users are friends.
